ygData.subject: A fiery Dawn!

X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=435352480; y=SuZAYJ16hfelEZxzbaPMUn80M-mxXQWhdp-FyzUvsGCNY9Dfm0DQlQ

As everyone screamed out of the chamber and down the various tunnels
and halls, the MAXIMALS and the PREDACONS find themselves and two
different sides of a large mountain - one that they both seemed to be
near the top of, and one that still continued to shutter and belch
forth smoke and flames!

Tunnels callapsed and rocks began to slide down the sides as the the
mountain transformed itself into a volcano!

Overhead the skies began to darken as gasses were pushed into the air,
followed by smoke and ash. The trees that were on the side of the
mountain were already begining to wilt and crumble as their roots,
which were buried in the mountain were being fed a concoction of
poisonous fluids and superheated magma. Birds over head screeched as
their very homes were falling away beneath them.

All around was an ocean of trees, this mountain volcano was going off
and was about the change the landscape for years to come!

However up into the skies, from out of the top of the volcano itself
there came a screeching cry as a large bird seemingly made almost
completly of fire came rising up out of the coronoa of heat.

The fiery bird flapped its wings throwing flame and plasma as it
climebed higher into the air and began to circle the mountain.

Incredulously the IFF signature from the bird was a lot like RODIMUS
PRIME, and in his claws, held unscathed was the dark sewmiconscious
form of NIGHTLIGHT!

Meanwhile TUSCON got a static filled call from LORD ELDER, "Tusco . .
zztt . . can .. . . .  me?"

Off in one corner, on the far side of the mountain WASPINATOR'S head
came rolling down the side of the mountain, bouncing a few times and
then sailing through the air to continue rolling.

(TAG)

- Preston
